cause.description:
This cause is for people who are hoping for the world to be a better place for everyone<including animals> There is already much polution in the air and oceans, lakes and ponds. We want to prevent this and help save whales and many other animals from extiction and secure a healthier place for everone to live in.
1. Save the Whales.
2. Prevent Polution.
3. Make the world a healthier and safer place to live.
cause.mission: Protect whales from poachers are prevent polution.
cause.name: Save the Whales of the World.
